FuncDef: The delete command deletes the corresponding file from the FTP server. The delete command deletes the corresponding file from the FTP server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the file that needs to be deleted from FTP server.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-insensitive characters without a blank space.

Examples: Warning: File temp.txt will be deleted. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Whether files can be deleted depends on whether the FTP user has the delete permission. To view the list of directories and files in the specified directory, run the dir command.
A file deleted in the FTP client view cannot be restored.
